Package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping

Class Terrain

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.Terrain
@Beta
public class Terrain
extends Object
A base class for cell level features common to roguelike dungeons.
Author:
Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

  • Method Details

    • symbol

      public char symbol()
      Returns the character representation for this terrain. This is meant to be for display purposes and should not be used to check for equality since multiple different terrains may return the same symbol.
      Returns:
      the representation of this terrain as a char

    • colorIndex

      public int colorIndex()
      Returns the color for this terrain as an index into some unspecified palette.
      Returns:
      the color for this terrain as an index into some unspecified palette
